column3: She clearly has no intention of speaking with you.
...Yes? Do you wish to ask me something?
What kind of place is this?
I am Beeril Ja, of the Hoobigo. The Glass-scaled, as some once called me, for my frail constitution.

I could no more become a warrior than I could help create blessed siblings. My very existence brought shame upon my people. But now...now I may find other ways to live a productive and fulfilling life.
This is Mamook, the forest sunk by meteorites, and home of us Mamool Ja.
Even if the old teachings have been renounced, change comes not in a day. Yet even if it is only one step at a time, we must keep moving forward.
So the Third and Second Promises are our new Dawnservants. For all they have done, I am grateful. Perhaps they can bring about real change.

Our contact with the outside world has increased in recent days, but I do not wish to join it. I once desired to leave this place and seek the land of sunlight above...but it would seem that I am more attached to this city than even I knew. Here, I am at home.
